volumeInfo.title: Petrus Logus
volumeInfo.subtitle: o guardião do tempo
volumeInfo.description: You master the beast within him? Even after the Third Great War, prejudice, power for power, slavery and social exclusion are still present in the world. No technology or access to sources of knowledge, the inhabitants of the Kingdom of Cosmos find themselves under the king's domain Apollo and its ruthless advisers. At that point, Petrus Logus the king's son, rebels and goes on to criticize his father's decisions and thereby signs his sentence of death. The most courageous and intelligent prince one sees on the biggest challenge of his life: to survive to release the kingdom and rediscover those you love. And amid all this, Petrus still know a beast that can either destroy it as it saves. An amazing adventure that will conquer you.

searchInfo.textSnippet: Quando as fontes de água secaram, as terras tornaram-se inférteis e a violência tomou conta do planeta, a grande Catástrofe aconteceu.
